parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.12
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns center of mass of an object.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getCenterOfMass''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - PhysX object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [x,y,z] offset relative to the model centre

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_com = [[getCenterOfMass]] _myCar;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getMass]], [[setCenterOfMass]], [[setMass]], [[addTorque]], [[addForce]]
</value></part></template></root>
